item.title: Connect with Microsoft Entra at upcoming events
item.description:
As we kick off the second half of FY25, the Microsoft Entra team is excited to announce groundbreaking advancements—including AI Agents and the Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) AI Gateway—and a full lineup of spring events. Join us to explore our latest innovations in identity and network security and get tips on getting more from your Microsoft Entra deployments. RSA Conference | San Francisco, CA | April 28–May 1 Meet the Microsoft Entra team at RSA! Visit the Microsoft booth #5744 for product demos and engaging theater sessions: Microsoft Entra theater sessions in booth #5744
